item.title: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

[quote=“I K0ed You Today, post:6, topic:144153”][quote author=Zandia link=topic=197650.msg1762930#msg1762930 date=1190027408]
search for “customCommand” its the method that holds all the commands.
[/quote]

Uh zandia,I thought it’s command.trim that holds all commands?[/quote]

No, I asked you to search for command.trim(); line so it’s easier for you to add your command that you needed help with yesterday.

item.title: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“1234ideclareathumbwar, post:3, topic:144153”][quote author=Travis_02 link=topic=197650.msg1763001#msg1763001 date=1190039498]
or just go to client.java and click edit and then find search command till you see somthing simialier to that and heres mine just add it under the}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pureskillz”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);

addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“Your now a pure”);
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“70defpure”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(751200, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);

addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);

addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“Your now a pure”);
}after this press enter and add your command save compile and run
[/quote]

or

if (command.startsWith("master") && playerRights > 1) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(486000000, i); } sendMessage("Wee.?"); }[/quote]
lol no its
} sendMessage(“go kill yourself with a buncha n33bs now k? ;)”);

item.title: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @jdogpwnz jdogpwnz
item.description:
@jdogpwnz wrote:

I need help making commands. I know how to make commands i just don’t know where to add 'em.

I know you gotta’ add them to client.java but wear?

What i mean is what do you put it?

Like do you put it right under this command?

if (command.startsWith(“pkarmor”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(775, 1);
addItem(1837, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(1052, 1);
addItem(1704, 1);
addItem(4712, 1);
addItem(4714, 1);
addItem(4708, 1);
addItem(6524, 1);
addItem(385, 19);
}

Do you put it right under all that?

Read full topic
